snippet.title: Zombie Night Terror - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Zombie Night Terror is available now! http://store.steampowered.com/app/416680/

Braaaaiiins… so delicious, and absolutely vital for a successful zombie apocalypse. Become the mastermind behind a growing horde of loveable undead, clawing and chewing your way through a city full of unsuspecting victims in Zombie Night Terror, available for PC & MAC.

Control each moment of the zombie outbreak, spreading the virus as thoroughly as possible, and lead your own zombie horde using special mutations to bypass traps, and turn uncooperative prey into brain-hungry allies. But beware, not all humans are useless meatbags, some will fight back in inventive ways.  So this summer, forget about saving the world. After all, the only way to survive the zombie apocalypse is to BE the zombie apocalypse!

Zombie Night Terror is available today in stores worldwide, including GOG.com, Steam, Humble Store, and Green Man Gaming. Choose from the standard, game-only edition or the Special Edition containing exclusive wallpapers and the original soundtrack.

For more information about Zombie Night Terror, please visit http://store.steampowered.com/app/416680/ or http://gambitious.com/games/zombie-night-terror and follow the devs @ZN_Terror.
